title: $1350-1B1B- expenses included (wo internet), w laundry, pet friendly
posting_body: ['Unit #3 is a cozy upstairs one-bedroom apartment in an old Ranch Mansion building (from 1921) remodeled into a four-plex.', 'It retains original trim, and cabinet.', 'The main bedroom is large, and has a closet with lots of space, shelving and upper storage.', 'Fully repainted, new blinds, new bathroom door, newer fridge, and gas stove.', 'Furnished with large evaporative cooler.', 'Six windows allow for natural light all day.', 'There are storage spaces on-site and in the basement, a community laundry area, and a community dumpster on site.', 'Front yard with tree cover for relaxing outside.', 'The backyard is large and fenced for pets or private gatherings, and has a covered deck (not pictured).', 'The main door has a deadbolt and doorknob lock.', 'Two exits allow easy access and move-in.', 'All expenses included !', 'Yes, water, utilities, trash, maintenance, landscaping, and laundry are part of sticker price (internet not included).', '.5 Miles to Oxford Station light rail.', 'Near S. Broadway bars, Swedish Medical Center, DU 10minutes to Denver, 20minutes to Red Rocks, 30mins to Castle Rock.', 'Off-street parking in back.', '$40 monthly pet rent per cat or dog.', '$200 non-refundable pet deposit.', 'Other pets must be approved.', '420 is fine.', 'No tobacco products indoors.', '12month lease.', 'Shorter lease terms are negotiable.', 'Lease start: ~Aug 1- 15 (July early move-in is free)', 'Deposit ($1350), and first month’s rent due at signing ($2700 total).', 'More if pets are included.', '$35 application fee.', 'Viewings available after application and fee submitted.', 'Open to reasonable negotiation.', 'If you find a better deal, including all expenses, let me know.', 'Serious inquiries only, please.']
